name: Tower 21
description:
Are you ready to fight?

You must protect our defective plane and repel the enemies one by one!

I trust you soldier! I believe he will be successful in this task.

If you are a beginner, you can start the battle on the "Normal" front and gain experience. 

If you have experience, must run to the "Hard" front and do your best to stop the enemy. 

Come on mission!

Game Properties: 18 different tower level.



8 different enemy type.



 Controls: Buy tower              Build it tower      Back to menu      And: • The game was developed in 3 days and I will continue to be develop.
• I will develop everything in the game (Art, code, music etc.).

• You can visit my profile to browse my other games. • and thanks.
